titleStmt.title: A full and perfect relation of a great and signal victory gain'd by the English and Hollanders over the French translated out of Dutch.
titleStmt.author: Waldeck, Georg Friedrich, Graf von, 1620-1692.

notesStmt.note: Written by Graf von Waldeck. Cf. text.
Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library (454:13) and Folger Shakespeare Library (2938:6).
